@suryamukhi:  I know, I hate generalizations and my remark has nothing to do with religion. But - the statistic (and history) bears the truth, of endless bitterness - for me, personally. My torrents are literally swarmed by yellow-white-green, but instead of just a shred of gratitude, I get - too little plain Thanks to be true. Let me repeat  what I said yesterday: Three Canadian peers I see in Download queue, and I got thanks from all of them, same goes for people from Australia and New Zealand. Point being, I know my "regulars" almost by name.

Contrary to that, your folk leads the crusade against me. Are Hollywood joined forces with Bollwood outsourcing their Witch-hunt against P2P? Anwer is, sorely, yes.

Are all people the same? Yes, by color of blood. Differences are in the heads, my Hindu fellow.

BTW, I have right here, few nice people from your country, couple of them I address and comprehend as Friends, but involvement in ultimately nefarious activities against me is, I am sorry, too much "from one direction" to be neglected or taken easily.

As formerly_azrielle noticed before, the hard-coded craziness with the voting system is happening again - now when you vote '+' for this torrent or more recent ones the '- ' count goes up by TWO, and if you vote '-', the '-' vote goes up by THREE (sorry, I had to check)! 

This again suggests at the very least that some twisted, petty individual with access to TPB code is targeting 20-40 - why?? And why are the mods not doing something???  

The last time we talked about this, the comments got deleted - I wonder if the same will happen again???

@ArtieT: Only TPB Administrator (higher ranked than Moderator) or Mod. with Admin. rights can access the sit code and modify it.
So, answer to your question is - obvious.

ERR (damn keyboard)

sit = site

2040: I agree with your thoughts about 'Hindu's, but extend it to 'Indians'. As I have seen, almost all my countrymen, no matter their religion, have a false sense of entitlement: if anyone helps them once (like you always do), they EXPECT to get help from the same source again and again. and they seem fit to criticize the effort, which cost them nothing in the first place.

I wish I could dish out some advice other than 'ignore the motherf*****rs', but I can't. On behalf of my countrymen who cause grief- I am Sorry.

There IS a bright side to this, twentyforty, and it is this--the largely minus averages will tend to keep the hit and run leechers from downloading your encodes.  Whereas those who have become acquainted with your quality, will download your encodes, and, more importantly, will spread the word by way of word of mouth to their friends and by positive comments.
Thank you once again 20/40, another top torrent, you are #1
